remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合包含所有子分配给当前对象。The collection holds all the child objects assigned to the current . 可以添加、 删除或克隆; 当您这样做时，所有子树中添加、 移除或克隆节点。You can add, remove, or clone a ; when you do this, all child tree nodes are added, removed, or cloned. 每个可以包含一系列其他对象。Each can contain a collection of other objects. 这可以导致难以确定你处于时循环访问集合。This can make it difficult to determine where you are in the when iterating through the collection. 若要确定你的树状结构中的位置，请使用属性。To determine your location in a tree structure, use the property. 可以使用分析字符串的字符串值来确定何处标签的起始和结束。The string can be parsed using the string value to determine where a label begins and ends. 通过设置设置标签属性显式。The label is set by setting the property explicitly. 替代方法是使用其中一个树节点具有表示一个字符串参数的构造函数属性。The alternative is to create the tree node using one of the constructors that has a string parameter that represents the property. 标签旁边显示映像，如果一个显示。The label is displayed next to the image, if one is displayed. 若要显示的树节点旁的映像，将分配到的父对象控制并分配通过引用中的索引值属性。To display images next to the tree nodes, assign an to the property of the parent control and assign an by referencing its index value in the property. 设置的索引值的属性想要显示时处于选定状态。Set the property to the index value of the you want to display when the is in an unselected state. 同样，设置的索引值的属性想要显示时处于选中状态。Likewise, set the property to the index value of the you want to display when the is selected. 选择特定的树节点，然后循环访问集合可以通过使用以下属性值： ， ， ， ， ， 。Selecting specific tree nodes and iterating through the collection can be achieved by using the following property values: , , , , , . 将分配返回到的上述属性之一属性来选择在该树节点控件。Assign the returned by one of aforementioned properties to the property to select that tree node in the control. 可以展开树节点以显示下一级别的子树节点。Tree nodes can be expanded to display the next level of child tree nodes. 用户可以展开按加号 （+） 按钮旁边，如果显示，则可以展开通过调用方法。The user can expand the by pressing the plus (+) button next to the , if one is displayed, or you can expand the by calling the method. 若要展开中的所有子树节点级别集合，请调用方法。To expand all child tree node levels in the collection, call the method. 您可以折叠子级别通过调用方法或用户可以按减号 （-） 按钮下, 一步，如果一个显示。You can collapse the child level by calling the method, or the user can press the minus (-) button next to the , if one is displayed. 您还可以调用方法进行交替之间展开和折叠状态。You can also call the method to alternate the between the expanded and collapsed states. 树节点 （可选） 可以显示一个复选框。Tree nodes can optionally display a check box. 若要显示复选框，请设置的属性到`true`。To display the check boxes, set the property of the to `true`. 属性设置为`true`对于树节点处于选中状态。The property is set to `true` for tree nodes that are in a checked state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的客户信息控件。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称和子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，有 15 个订单显示 1,000 名客户。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. summary.span: 开始编辑树节点标签。

span.span: Initiates the editing of the tree node label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法的典型方案是在调用的事件或。A typical scenario to use this method is to call it on the event of a or . > [!NOTE] > 当此方法才有效的属性设置为`true`。This method only works if the property of the is set to `true`. 如果设置为`false`、 引发异常和树节点将不会处于可编辑状态。If is set to `false`, an exception is thrown and the tree node will not be put into an editable state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例可让用户使用编辑非根树节点。The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标处的位置确定和存储在变量名为`mySelectedNode`。When the user right-clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了非根树节点，则它会处于可编辑状态，这样就允许用户编辑节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 用户停止编辑树节点标签后，新的标签文本计算，并保存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 对于此示例中，有几个字符被视为不在标签文本中有效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果一个无效字符中的标签字符串，或者该字符串为空，用户将收到错误通知和标签返回到其以前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text.
